metadata.name: dream big, little shoes
metadata.description:
"Believe it to see it, little one."

Girl's Converse All-Star shoes lifting the tail of the skateboard with heal up/toe down force on the nose, sans child. Mono photography mixed with digital oil painting. 6000 x 4000 pixels.  Work spanned over a few days in May 2022.

25% of the sale goes straight to "GiveDirectly.org" via smart contract split - a great charity that is highly functional giving cash directly to families around the world most in need.

This is my first mint on Foundation - so grateful to be here!
